title: A Step-by-Step Guide to Copy Crosshair in Valorant

steps.title: Spectate the teammate with the crosshair you want.
steps.content: Spectate the teammate with the crosshair you want. You need to be dead and spectating the person with the crosshair you want in order to use the copy command. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make a crosshair profile for the new crosshair.
steps.content: Make a crosshair profile for the new crosshair. You can find this in the Settings menu under Crosshair . Create a new profile and give it a name to easily find it later.

steps.title: Enter /crosshair copy or /cc in the chat.
steps.content: Enter /crosshair copy or /cc in the chat. Type this into chat like you're talking to your buddies, then press Enter on your keyboard to send the command. Just like that, you've copied their crosshair settings! [2] X Research source Make sure the crosshair profile is selected before your next game to see the new crosshair. Try out different crosshair profiles to improve your gameplay .

steps.title: Open Settings and navigate to your crosshair profile.
steps.content: Open Settings and navigate to your crosshair profile. If you have a crosshair that you want to share with others, you can easily share it using a code! [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click the "Export" icon.
steps.content: Click the "Export" icon. It's the icon of an arrow pointing up and will give you a code to copy. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Copy the code and paste it anywhere.
steps.content: Copy the code and paste it anywhere. You can paste this into any platform you're using, like Discord or Facebook Messenger. [5] X Research source To get that crosshair, the other person needs to create a new crosshair profile and then click the "Import" icon (the arrow pointing down). They can paste the code into the Import box.
